title: Set Up Automated Investing
description: A client wants to set up an automatic monthly investment from their bank account into their portfolio.

tasks.description: Confirm the investment details: amount, frequency, start date, and source bank account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the client's instructions for the automated investment.

tasks.description: Verify that the external bank account is linked and validated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the client's checking account is properly linked for transfers.

tasks.description: Create the recurring investment plan in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the plan to automatically invest $1000 on the 15th of each month.
